text: Charles Boli (born 30 August 1998) is a professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Lens in the French Ligue 1. The son of footballer Roger Boli, he was born in Scotland, and also holds French nationality. ==Career== On 16 May 2019, Boli signed his first professional contract with RC Lens. He made his professional first match for Lens in a 2–1 Coupe de la Ligue win over Troyes on 13 August 2019. He signed a new four-year contract with Lens in January 2020.Meet the Dundee-born footballer who is tearing up Ligue 2 in France - and has just been handed a bumper new deal by Lens, The Scotsman, 14 January 2020 ==Personal life== Boli is the son of the Ivorian former footballer Roger Boli, nephew of French international footballer Basile Boli, and cousin of Ivorian footballer Yannick Boli.
